content: ***this is a free pattern but it s intended for personal use only do not redistribute this pattern by yourself even if credits are given to the author this still constitutes copyright infringement *** this is a pattern to crochet a cute little turtle not the finished product crochet level beginner and above the pattern is a pdf document with written instructions on how to crochet the turtle accompanied by explanatory pictures you can find a youtube playlist with all the instructions to recreate it at the following address https //www youtube com/playlist list=pljgiplu_xbsk7qjt66tlk5osftffbvdc0 the finished product should be around 6cm tall and 4cm wide of course it depends on how you work and on the kind of hook and yarn used feel free to contact me on instagram for any questions ***please mention the author me when posting online on instagram specify pattern by @chiacrafts and use hashtag #chiacraftspatterns *** i hope this pattern will be useful to you that you ll have lots of fun and that the turtle you re going to create will make somebody very happy
